es.csic.iiia.nsm.visualization.norms.chart

Class PerformanceRangeChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.csic.iiia.nsm.visualization.norms.chart.PerformanceRangeChart

  • public class PerformanceRangeChart
extends java.lang.Object
    A performance range chart shows the performance range of a norm or a norm group in terms of a system Goal. In the case of a Norm, the chart shows the performance range of the norm in terms of two dimension: effectiveness and necessity. In the case of a NormGroup, the chart shows the performance range in terms of the effectiveness of the group of norms to avoid conflicts
    Author:
    "Javier Morales (jmorales@iiia.csic.es)"
    See Also:
    PerformanceRange
